script.speaker: Zara (Host)
script.line: Welcome to Interdimensional Radio, where the vibes are out of this universe!

script.speaker: Kip (Tech Guru)
script.line: Yo, Zara! Did you just tune into the 7th dimension? My antenna is still smoking!

script.speaker: Mira (Comedian)
script.line: Hold up—if it's smoking, does that mean we need a fire extinguisher or a portal to the fire‑proof realm?

script.speaker: Zara
script.line: Both! *laughs* Anyway, let’s drop the beat and see what the cosmos has for us.

script.speaker: SFX
script.line: [Deep, resonant bass thump echoing across galaxies]

script.speaker: Mira
script.line: Whoa! My coffee just turned into a nebula. Anyone else feeling… *spaced out*?

script.speaker: Zara
script.line: That’s the ‘wow’ moment, folks—when your morning brew becomes a supernova!

script.speaker: Kip
script.line: Quick—record this! The intergalactic algorithm loves spontaneous supernovas.

script.speaker: Mira
script.line: And if you missed it, just check the comments—our pet black hole left a clue!

script.speaker: Zara
script.line: Alright, time’s almost up. Remember, the universe is listening…
